.dropdown-menu{position:static;float:none}.iet-global-assets .navbar-text{display:inline-block;padding-top:.5rem;padding-bottom:.5rem}.iet-global-assets .column{width:33.333%;padding:0}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-bar ul .row .column:last-of-type li:last-of-type,.iet-global-assets iet-global-bar ul .row .column:last-of-type .iet-global-bar ul.nav-opened>li>a,.iet-global-assets iet-global-bar ul.nav-opened>li>a{background-color:#ccc;color:rgba(0,0,0,.9);text-decoration:none}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-bar a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none;padding:20px;display:inline-block;width:100%}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-bar ul a:hover,.iet-global-assets iet-global-bar ul .iet-global-footer,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer{display:block;font-size:1rem;padding-top:40px}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer>div:last-of-type .umb-grid,.iet-global-assets .contact-us-subtitle,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .contact-us-subtitle{color:rgba(83,39,78,.9)!important;font-size:.85rem!important}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer div,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .row.contact-bottom-row div{padding:0}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .row .contact-bottom-row ul,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .row .contact-bottom-row ul{margin-bottom:20px}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .row .contact-bottom-row ul li,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .row .contact-bottom-row ul li{padding:5px 0}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .row .contact-block,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .row .contact-block{padding-left:0;padding-right:25px;margin-bottom:20px}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .nav-footer,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .nav-footer{padding-top:2rem}@media screen and (max-width:767px){.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list h2,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list h2{border-top:1px solid #ccc;cursor:pointer;transition:all .5s ease-out}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list h2:hover,.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list-h2-active,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list h2:hover,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list-h2-active{background:#5d455f}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list h2,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list h2{padding:10px 20px;margin:0 -15px}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list:last-of-type h2,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list:last-of-type h2{border-bottom:1px solid #ccc}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list ul,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list ul{display:none;transition:all 1s ease-out;list-style-type:none;margin-bottom:15px}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list ul.displayBlock,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list ul.displayBlock{display:block}.iet-global-assets .iet-global-footer .footer-link-list ul li,.iet-global-assets iet-global-footer .footer-link-list ul li{margin:12px 10px;list-style:none}}
  </style>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   /*
 *   Container for functions, to provide a better syntax highlighting experience
 */
var functions = {

    setupSitesCloseButton: function (siteNav) {

        var closeElement = document.createElement("div");
        closeElement.id = "close-site-nav";

        var closeAnchorElement = document.createElement("a");
        closeAnchorElement.text = "X";
        closeAnchorElement.href = "#";

        closeElement.append(closeAnchorElement);

        var siteList = siteNav.getElementsByClassName("row");
        if (siteList[0] !== undefined) siteList[0].prepend(closeElement);

    },

    isNode: function (element) {
        return (
            typeof Node === "object" ? element instanceof Node :
                element && typeof element === "object" && typeof element.nodeType === "number" && typeof element.nodeName === "string"
        );
    },

    /* Toggle between hiding footer lists in mobile view when the user clicks on the heading - see footer.scss for related css*/
    footerAccordionise: function (element) {
        console.log("Hit");
        var footerHeader = element;
        var footerList = element.nextElementSibling;

        if (footerList.classList.contains('displayBlock')) {
            footerList.classList.remove('displayBlock');
            footerHeader.classList.remove('footer-link-list-h2-active');
        } else {
            footerList.classList.add('displayBlock');
            footerHeader.classList.add('footer-link-list-h2-active');
        }
    }

}


document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {

    const minDesktopWidth = 1025;

    var currentWindowWidth = window.innerWidth;
    var ietSiteNav = document.getElementById("iet-site-nav");
    if (ietSiteNav !== null) functions.setupSitesCloseButton(ietSiteNav);
    var globalNavCloseButton = document.getElementById('close-site-nav');
    var siteNavToggle = document.getElementById("site-nav-toggle");
    var footerListHeading = document.querySelectorAll(".footer-link-list h2");

    if (globalNavCloseButton != null) {
        //the nav close button exists
        globalNavCloseButton.addEventListener("click", function (event) {

            event.preventDefault();

            // console.log("Toggling nav class...");

            if (ietSiteNav !== null) {

                ietSiteNav.classList.toggle("nav-opened");

            }
        });
    }

    if (siteNavToggle !== null) {

        // console.log("Site nav toggle: %O", siteNavToggle);

        siteNavToggle.addEventListener("click", function (event) {

            event.preventDefault();

            // console.log("Toggling nav class...");

            if (currentWindowWidth <= minDesktopWidth) ietSiteNav.classList.toggle("nav-opened");

            if (!ietSiteNav.classList.contains("nav-opened")) {
                // console.log("Losing focus...");
                ietSiteNav.blur();
            }

        });

    }

    if (footerListHeading) {

        for (var i in footerListHeading) {

            var item = footerListHeading[i];

            // Check that the item in the array is actually a DOM node element
            if (functions.isNode(item)) {

                item.addEventListener('click', function () {
                    functions.footerAccordionise(this);
                });

            }

        }
    }


    window.addEventListener("resize", function () {

		/*
			This next check was needed to fix a bug on mobile devices where the navigation would automatically collapse
			when the page was scrolled.  The issue was the height of browser window becomes taller when
			scrolling down the page because of some default browser functionality.  If you scroll down
			the page, the top part of the browser becomes smaller, normally hiding the url bar, which increases the
			viewable area of the web page.
			This triggers a browser 'resize' event, which then runs the code to automatically collapse the
			side nav when on a screen size that's smaller than desktop.  As it's only the height of the browser
			that's changing, we can simply double check to see if the width has actually changed before doing anything.
		*/
        //don't do anything if the width of the browser hasn't changed.
        if (currentWindowWidth === window.innerWidth) return;

        currentWindowWidth = window.innerWidth;

        if (window.innerWidth >= minDesktopWidth) {

            //remove the mobile nav open class

            if (ietSiteNav !== undefined) {

                ietSiteNav.classList.remove("nav-opened");

            }

        }
        else if (window.innerWidth < minDesktopWidth) {

            // Something to do when in mobile view

        }

    })

});
//# sourceMappingURL=scripts.js.map
  </script>

  </script>

                <a href="https://engineering-jobs.theiet.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                 E&amp;T Jobs
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://eandt.theiet.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                 E&amp;T Magazine
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.ietconnect.org/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
                 Foothold
                </a>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </li>
     </ul>
     <iet-user-panel>
      <span class="intro">
       Welcome
      </span>
      <a class="instruction" href="https://www2.theiet.org/login/index.cfm/?originUrl=https://www.theiet.org/">
       Login
      </a>
     </iet-user-panel>
     <iet-global-search>

       <button class="primary-btn" type="submit">
        Search
       </button>
      </form>
     </iet-global-search>
    </div>
   </iet-global-bar>
  </div>

  <div id="main">
   <div class="container-fluid">
    <div class="iet-banner iet-banner--purple">
     <picture>
      <source media="(min-width: 1366px)" srcset="/media/5846/iet150_homepage-hero-banner.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=1920&amp;height=625&amp;rnd=132340279710000000">
       <source media="(min-width: 992px)" srcset="/media/5846/iet150_homepage-hero-banner.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=1366&amp;height=625&amp;rnd=132340279710000000">
        <source media="(min-width: 768px)" srcset="/media/5846/iet150_homepage-hero-banner.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=768&amp;height=460&amp;rnd=132340279710000000">
         <img alt="" class="iet-banner-background" src="/media/5846/iet150_homepage-hero-banner.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=768&amp;height=982&amp;rnd=132340279710000000"/>
        </source>
       </source>
      </source>
     </picture>
     <div class="iet-banner-content">
      <div class="iet-banner-heading">
       <img alt="" class="iet-banner-image" src="/Areas/org2018/images/banner/equals-purple.png"/>
       <h1 class="iet-banner-title">
        Making a difference for 150 years
       </h1>
      </div>
      <h4 class="iet-banner-text">
       Our anniversary celebrations have begun. Join in with inspiring and exciting things happening around the world, and help make this a year to remember.
      </h4>
      <a class="iet-banner-button primary-btn" href="https://celebrate150.theiet.org/">
       Get involved
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

    <div class="row reset-paddings">
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta-full-width promo-module col-sm-8 iet-orange-dark-100">
      <a href="/media/press-releases/press-releases-2021/11-february-2021-iet-s-engineering-open-house-day-2021-is-going-virtual/">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="On Friday, 23 July 2021 in collaboration with organisations across the UK and internationally, we will be holding a virtual Engineering Open House Day, to inspire the next generation of engineers. " src="/media/7700/eohd.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=683&amp;height=384&amp;rnd=132579652720000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-full-width-info">
        <span class="cta-type">
         Engineering Open House Day
        </span>
        <h3 style="">
         On Friday, 23 July 2021 in collaboration with organisations across the UK and internationally, we will be holding a virtual Engineering Open House Day, to inspire the next generation of engineers.
        </h3>
        <div class="button-container">
         <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">

   <div class="container-fluid">
    <div class="iet-homepage-title-banner">
     <div class="content-wrap">
      <h2>
       Events
      </h2>
      <h3>
       What's going on?
      </h3>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="container">
    <div class="row reset-paddings">
     <iet-secondary-cta-full-width class="iet-purple-light-20">
      <div class="container">
       <a href="https://cyberics.theiet.org/">
        <div class="image-container">
         <img alt="Cyber ICS Main Image" src="/media/7661/cyber-ics-main-image.jpg"/>
        </div>
        <iet-secondary-cta-full-width-info class="">
         <h3>
          Cyber Security for Industrial Control Systems
         </h3>
         <p>
          ONLINE CONFERENCE

Connect with key cyber security professionals online and gain updates on building and maintaining resilient systems. Join us on 5 - 6 May for an online conference, with talks from the National Cyber Security Centre, BT, McAfee, Hitachi-ABB Power Grids and Rockwell Automation.
         </p>
         <div class="button-container">
          <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
           Go to https://cyberics.theiet.org/
          </div>
         </div>
        </iet-secondary-cta-full-width-info>
       </a>
      </div>
     </iet-secondary-cta-full-width>
     <iet-secondary-cta-full-width class="iet-blue-light-20">
      <div class="container">
       <a href="https://www.cired2021.org/">
        <div class="image-container">
         <img alt="CIRED 2021 Rade By Night" src="/media/7571/cired-2021-rade-by-night.jpg"/>
        </div>
        <iet-secondary-cta-full-width-info class="">
         <h3>
          CIRED 2021
         </h3>
         <p>
          CONFERENCE

New details of the CIRED 2021 programme have been announced! Visit the website to learn more about our exciting tutorials, round tables, technical visits, gala dinner and the programme schedule.
         </p>
         <div class="button-container">
          <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
           Go to https://www.cired2021.org/
          </div>
         </div>
        </iet-secondary-cta-full-width-info>
       </a>
      </div>
     </iet-secondary-cta-full-width>
    </div>
   </div>

       <div class="image-container">

       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         Member News
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         Help us change the face of engineering and technology
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         Help us change the face of engineering and technology
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 iet-purple-dark-100">
      <a href="https://www.theiet.org/membership/member-news/member-news-2021/a-blog-from-nigel-fine-iet-chief-executive-and-secretary/">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="Member News" src="/media/2969/nigel-fine-preferred-photo.jpg?center=0.35833333333333334,0.47333333333333333&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=498&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132290074630000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         Member News
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         A blog from Nigel Fine, IET Chief Executive and Secretary
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         https://www.theiet.org/membership/member-news/member-news-2021/a-blog-from-nigel-fine-iet-chief-executive-and-secretary/
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-6 iet-green-dark-100">
      <a href="https://engineering-jobs.theiet.org">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="Engineering jobs" src="/media/2733/e-j-1.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=636&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132290074630000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         Engineering jobs
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         Search for engineering jobs from leading engineering employers. If you need to recruit top engineering talent  find out how the IET can help.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         https://engineering-jobs.theiet.org
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="container">
    <div class="row reset-paddings">
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-6 iet-blue-dark-100">
      <a href="/impact-society/factfiles/energy-factfiles/energy-generation-and-policy/the-iet-lighthouse-series-coordinating-offshore-energy-systems/">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="New Coordinating Offshore Energy Systems Report" src="/media/7838/iet-offshore-energy-report.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=636&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132603902290000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         New Coordinating Offshore Energy Systems Report
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         The UK commitment to net-zero greenhouse emissions by 2050 is driving previously separate industries to build and repurpose offshore energy assets. Find out more.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         The IET lighthouse series  coordinating offshore energy systems
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 iet-purple-dark-100">
      <a href="https://events.theiet.org/events/project-management-techniques-live-online-1/">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="Project Management course" src="/media/7819/project-management-techniques-course-iet.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=498&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132597790880000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         Project Management course
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         This e-class is an introduction to handling the various aspects of project management including: technical, strategic, organisational and people management.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         https://events.theiet.org/events/project-management-techniques-live-online-1/
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-6 col-md-6 col-lg-3 iet-orange-dark-100">
      <a href="https://academy.theiet.org/smart-homes">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="IET Academy" src="/media/7844/iet-academy-smart-homes-electrical-installers-course.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=498&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132604737680000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         IET Academy
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         Find out how you can deliver perfect smart homes solutions for your customers! Our Academy online Smart Homes for Electrical Installers course introduces the key principles and technologies involved in smart homes. Buy your course today!
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         https://academy.theiet.org/smart-homes
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="container">
    <div class="row reset-paddings">
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-6 iet-purple-dark-100">
      <a href="https://eandt.theiet.org/content/articles/2021/03/uk-halfway-to-net-zero-emissions-target-according-to-analysis/" target="_blank">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="Engineering news" src="/media/7848/fire.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=636&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132605509050000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         Engineering news
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         UK halfway to net-zero emissions target, according to analysis
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         https://eandt.theiet.org/content/articles/2021/03/uk-halfway-to-net-zero-emissions-target-according-to-analysis/
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="iet-secondary-cta teaser-module col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-6 iet-black-default-60">
      <a href="https://eandt.theiet.org/content/articles/2021/03/bp-announces-plans-for-blue-hydrogen-plant-in-teesside/">
       <div class="image-container">
        <img alt="Engineering news" src="/media/7849/bp.jpg?anchor=center&amp;mode=crop&amp;width=636&amp;height=300&amp;rnd=132605509420000000"/>
       </div>
       <div class="iet-secondary-cta-info">
        <h3>
         Engineering news
        </h3>
        <p style="">
         BP announces plans for blue hydrogen plant in Teesside
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="button-container">
        <div class="primary-btn-arrow-right">
         https://eandt.theiet.org/content/articles/2021/03/bp-announces-plans-for-blue-hydrogen-plant-in-teesside/
        </div>
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <footer class="m-footer">

            <div>
             <p>
              Contact us
             </p>
             <h2 class="iet-h4">
              <a class="contact-us-subtitle" href="https://www.theiet.org/about/our-offices/">
               Our Offices

             <h2 class="iet-h4">

              </a>

        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </iet-global-footer>
   </div>
  </footer>
  <input id="cookieName" name="cookieName" type="hidden" value="site-maintenance"/>

&lt;p&gt;The IET website is currently undergoing system maintenance. Some IET services will be temporarily unavailable.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;During this time, you will be unable to log on to the IET family of websites. We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.&lt;/p&gt;"/>

   google.load('search', '1', { "callback": function () { } });
        $(document).ready(function () {
            google.setOnLoadCallback(function () {
                google.search.CustomSearchControl.attachAutoCompletion(
                    '013072311606752261868%3Aabitwdgbuwo',
                    document.getElementById('q'),
                    'siteSearch');
            });
        });

  <script src="https://cc.cdn.civiccomputing.com/9/cookieControl-9.x.min.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   var jsCookieConfig = {"apiKey":"b996bc077b9517a02fb9d06b70b10ef2187b860f","product":"PRO_MULTISITE","text":{"title":null,"intro":"We use necessary cookies to make our site work. We'd also like to set optional analytics cookies to help us improve it.","acceptSettings":null,"acceptRecommended":"Accept recommended","accept":"Accept recommended","rejectSettings":"Save my preferences","reject":"Save my preferences","settings":null,"necessaryTitle":null,"necessaryDescription":null,"thirdPartyTitle":null,"thirdPartyDescription":null,"on":null,"off":null,"notifyTitle":null,"notifyDescription":null,"closeLabel":"Save and close","cornerButton":null,"landmark":null},"optionalCookies":[{"name":"analytics","label":"Analytical Cookies","description":"We'd like to set Google Analytics cookies to help us to improve our website by collecting and reporting information on how you use it. The cookies collect information in a way that does not directly identify anyone.","cookies":["_ga","_gid","_gat","__utmt","__utma","__utmb","__utmc","__utmz","__utmv"],"onAccept":"(function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {\n            i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r;\n            i[r] = i[r] ||\n                function () {\n                    (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)\n                }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date();\n            a = s.createElement(o),\n                m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];\n            a.async = 1;\n            a.src = g;\n            m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)\n        })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');\n\nwindow['ga-disable-UA-12690477-39'] = false;\nwindow['ga-disable-UA-92400917-1'] = false;\n\nconsole.log(\"Google Analytics Active\");console.log(\"Standard tracking\");\nga('create', 'UA-12690477-39', 'auto');console.log(\"Global tracking\");\nga('create', 'UA-92400917-1', 'auto', 'ietDigitalDomain');(function ($) {\n    var actions = {\n        click: 'Click',\n        download: 'Download',\n        outboundLink: 'Outbound link'\n    };\n\n    var eventDefinitions = [\n        {\n            parentSelector: 'ul#topbar-men',\n            eventCategory: 'Link-tracking - global header'\n        },\n        {\n            parentSelector: 'nav#navbar',\n            eventCategory: 'Link-tracking - local header'\n        },\n        {\n            parentSelector: 'div#main',\n            eventCategory: 'Link-tracking - content'\n        },\n        {\n            parentSelector: 'footer.m-footer',\n            eventCategory: 'Link-tracking - local footer'\n        }\n    ];\n\n    function buildLinkSelectors() {\n        return $.map(eventDefinitions, function (val) { return val.parentSelector + ' a' }).join();\n    }\n\n    function isInternalFileRequest(url) {\n\n        if (!isOutboundLink(url)) {\n            var filename = url.split('/').pop();\n            return filename.match(/(\\.doc|\\.docx|\\.exe|\\.pdf|\\.mp3|\\.ppt|\\.pptx|\\.txt|\\.xls|\\.xlsx|\\.zip)$/i);\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n\n    function isOutboundLink(url) {\n        var locationHostname = $(location).attr('host');\n        var matches = url.match(/^(?:https?)?\\:?\\/\\/([^\\/?#]+)(?:[\\/?#]|$)/i);\n        var linkHostname = matches && matches[1];\n\n        return url.indexOf(locationHostname) === -1 && linkHostname != null;\n    }\n\n    function sendGaEvent(eventCategory, eventAction, eventLabel) {\n        try {\n            if (eventAction === actions.outboundLink) {\n                ga('send',\n                    'event',\n                    {\n                        eventCategory: eventCategory,\n                        eventAction: eventAction,\n                        eventLabel: eventLabel,\n                        transport: 'beacon',\n                        nonInteraction: true\n                    });\n            } else {\n                ga('send',\n                    'event',\n                    {\n                        eventCategory: eventCategory,\n                        eventAction: eventAction,\n                        eventLabel: eventLabel\n                    });\n            }\n        } catch (e) {\n            if (window.console != undefined) {\n                window.console.log(e);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    function trackLinkClick(e) {\n        var elem = $(this);\n        $.each(eventDefinitions,\n            function (idx, val) {\n                var match = elem.closest(val.parentSelector).length;\n                if (match) {\n                    var href;\n                    var filename = elem.attr(\"data-filename\");\n                    var description = elem.attr(\"data-description\");\n\n                    // set \"href\" value\n                    if (typeof filename !== typeof undefined && filename !== false && filename != '') {\n                        href = filename;\n                    } else {\n                        href = elem.attr(\"href\");\n                    }\n\n                    // set \"text\" value\n                    if (typeof description !== typeof undefined && description !== false && description != '') {\n                        text = description;\n                    } else {\n                        text = elem.text().trim();\n                    }\n\n                    var label = text + ' - ' + href;\n\n                    if (isInternalFileRequest(href)) {\n                        sendGaEvent(val.eventCategory, actions.download, label);\n                    }\n                    else if (isOutboundLink(href)) {\n                        sendGaEvent(val.eventCategory, actions.outboundLink, label);\n                    }\n                    else {\n                        sendGaEvent(val.eventCategory, actions.click, label);\n                    }\n                }\n                return !match;\n            });\n    }\n\n    $(document).on('click', buildLinkSelectors(), trackLinkClick);\n\n})(jQuery);","onRevoke":"console.log(\"Standard tracking disabled\");\nwindow['ga-disable-UA-12690477-39'] = true;\nconsole.log(\"Global tracking disabled\");\nwindow['ga-disable-UA-92400917-1'] = true;","recommendedState":true,"lawfulBasis":null}],"necessaryCookies":["ASP.NET_SessionId","CFID","CFTOKEN","DOMAINKEY","IETLOGONSESSIONID","IET_SSO_Cookie","MembershipNumber","OriginURL","SSEQUENCE","STOKEN","id_token","WT_FPC"],"position":"LEFT","theme":"DARK","notifyOnce":false,"initialState":"open","rejectButton":false,"layout":null,"toggleType":null,"acceptBehaviour":null,"closeOnGlobalChange":true,"closeStyle":"button","settingsStyle":null,"branding":null,"excludedCountries":null,"notifyDismissButton":false,"setInnerHTML":false,"sameSiteCookie":false,"sameSiteValue":null};

			if (jsCookieConfig.text === null) jsCookieConfig.text = {};

			// Clear out all of the unused config settings
			for (var i in jsCookieConfig) {

				if (jsCookieConfig[i] === null) delete jsCookieConfig[i];

				if(i === 'text'){

					for(var ii in jsCookieConfig[i]){

						if (jsCookieConfig[i][ii] === null) delete jsCookieConfig[i][ii];

					}

				}

			}

			// Loop through all of the scripts and wrap them in a function
			for (var i in jsCookieConfig.optionalCookies) {

				var optionalCookie = jsCookieConfig.optionalCookies[i];

				optionalCookie.onAccept = new Function(optionalCookie.onAccept);
				optionalCookie.onRevoke = new Function(optionalCookie.onRevoke);

			}

			console.log("Cookie config: %O", jsCookieConfig);

			CookieControl.load(jsCookieConfig);
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.onload = function () {

			// Check to see if Google Analytics is loaded from Global Assets
			if (window.ga && ga.create) {

						ga('send', 'pageview');

						ga('ietDigitalDomain.send', 'pageview');

			}

		}
  </script>
